title: Champion Reveal: Illaoi, the Kraken Priestess

Finally riot, you have created a champion which is not over dramatized in cuteness.

Kalista, Velkoz, Tahm Kench, Ekko, Azir, Rek'Sai, Yasuo ...

Edit: and these are all recent champions too...
